label: 新定酒式
本: Sugawara no Michizane and the Early Heian Court . University of Hawai'i Press . 1994
説明文: (Written by Sugawara no Kiyokimi.) Unfortunately, only fragments survive, but they reveal that the work dealt with such matters as how wine cups were to be exchanged between guest and host, and punishments" for impoprieties at imperial banquets (p. 48). [菅原清公] "
